column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I ordered the signature Jin-ya bao ($3.95) and the spicy chicken ramen ($11.50
column2: spicy level hot) and added an egg (+ $1.25) and a bottle of Perrier ($3.25).  With my order I received 2 thinly sliced pieces of chicken in my ramen
column3: which still could not save the dish.  The bao was really good
column4: the pork belly was tender and well seasoned
column5: and the bao was soft and sweet
column7: I'd give it a 4 out of 5. On the other hand
column10: and neither was the added egg.
